author: pipermerriam
content:
Looking at the merge plans, we will probably need to be prepared to do the "upgrade" work for switching from Eth1 POW header chain to post-merge POS header chain.  

- https://hackmd.io/@n0ble/ethereum_consensus_upgrade_mainnet_perspective
- https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/a465f21deb5df945ff629b87d3b1de229cbceb3f/specs/altair/sync-protocol.md
